item.title: Known Issue: Swag 1.15.0
item.description: An upstream issue with certbot has broken some of the DNS validation plugins used by swag. If you are affected by this issue, please roll back to version-1.14.0 until 1.16 is released.
item.content: An upstream issue with certbot has broken some of the DNS validation plugins used by swag. If you are affected by this issue, please roll back to version-1.14.0 until 1.16 is released.
